name: Elemental Souls
description:
Full screen not recommended

Immerse yourself in a fantasy universe where elements are matched to earn soul crystals. These crystals unlock portals. Special portals will unlock Creature Soul Cards for your collection.

Each element has a creature to collect:

Earth = Lamia

Fire = Succubus

Water = Mermaid

Air = Fairy

Light = Angel

Dark = Elf

All players are gifted 9999 in-game gold bars to acquire all the power ups and weapons they need to be able to achieve 3 gems on every level of the game.
